name: EasySpace
description:
Hi. I'm XANDI. The new indie dev in the city.  And behold, cuz  I'm goin UP. 

This is EasySpace. My first game to be released. (Cuz my first, first game it's still in developer, spoiler, it's a Metroidvania :D) EasySpace it's a Space Shooter that it's meen to be a free android game; yeah, yeah, i know, there's thousands of space shooters androids games, BUT THIS IS DIFERENT! How it's different?? Play it and you found it out!

I upload this demo for send it to some youtubers in order to get more public, but u can play it too! Have fun and tell me your thoughts in the comments section. Thank you very much for playing btw. :D
